name: Avoid Procedures with more than X lines of code  (RPG400)
description:
This rule searches all the procedures having more than X  lines of code.
X is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists RPG400 Procedure with more than X lines of code.
It provides the following information:
RPG400 Procedure full name
rationale: Maintainability of the code is facilitated if there the programs are not too big.
remediation: Review the source code in order to have procedures with less than X lines of code.
